name: A Dragon Named Figment
description:
The concept of dragons itself is disappearing.

You are a dragon on your final flight, as you are slowly fading into nonexistence.

How will you be forgotten?

A short arcade-style game made for Brackey's Game Jam 7!

Gameplay
Fly through the sky, ramming into floating debris and structures while unloading your Material Eviscerator at high speeds. The more you destroy, the higher your score goes!

As time passes, your time will run short. Destroying things will make you a little more real for a short time, but soon you will run out of debris. How will you spend your last moments?

Controls
Note: All controller controls only function on the downloadable Windows build.

- WASD / Left Joystick - Adjust Figment's position slightly, allowing for bullet spread and neat-looking trail lines.

- Mouse / Right Joystick - Rotate Figment to go in different directions.

- LMB / RB - Fire the Material Eviscerator gun.

- Shift / LT - Boost! Figment moves a lot faster.

- Space Bar / LB - Brake, slows you down. Useful for aiming or sharp turns.

Credits

Design, Programming, Visuals: Maxwell Lovell
